title: New fear unlocked: Samsung Galaxy Ring battery scare leaves user stranded and hospitalized
summary: From health tracker to health hazard.
body: Credit: X/@ZONEofTECH TL;DR A Galaxy Ring user says the battery swelled while the device was on their finger, leaving it stuck and painful. The user was denied boarding a flight and had the ring removed in hospital using ice and medical lubricant. Photos of the ring after it was removed show a visibly distorted battery. The Samsung Galaxy Ring is designed to track your health, but a bizarre malfunction for one owner says it was actually the cause of an emergency hospital visit.
